detail.text: Search: - Project Code - Business Initiative Name - Company
Filter: - Company - Status - Last Sync Date (Date Range)
Sorting ASC,DESC: - Project Code - Business Initiative Name - Company - CAPEX Estimate - IRR Estimate - NPV Estimate - Status - Last Sync Date
Project Code - Hyperlink to detail
Business Initiative Name - Read Only
Company - Read Only
CAPEX Estimate - Currency format (IDR) - Read Only
IRR Estimate - Percentage format - Read Only
NPV Estimate - Currency format (IDR) - Read Only
Status - Tag format with color - Green: Assign, Orange: Unassign
Last Sync Date - Date format - Read Only
Roles - Shows '-' for status 'Assign' - Shows 'Add Approver & Viewer' button for status 'Unassign'
Role: Admin
Default sorting based on most recent data
Roles Column Behavior: - Display '-' for records with status 'Assign' (already assigned) - Display 'Add Approver & Viewer' button for records with status 'Unassign'
Sync Manual Button: Primary button to synchronize data manually
Perusahaan: - Text Field - Read Only - Display '-' when status is 'Unassign' - Display company name when status is 'Assign'
Tim Project: - Text Field - Read Only - Display '-' when status is 'Unassign' - Display team name when status is 'Assign'
Approver PMO AH: - Display as comma-separated list - Read Only - Display '-' when status is 'Unassign' - Display approver names when status is 'Assign'
Approver PMO Mind ID: - Display as comma-separated list - Read Only - Display '-' when status is 'Unassign' - Display approver names when status is 'Assign'
Viewer: - Display as comma-separated list - Read Only - Display '-' when status is 'Unassign' - Display viewer names when status is 'Assign'
Investment Name: - Text Field - Read Only
Company: - Text Field - Read Only
Investment Code: - Text Field - Read Only
Project Code: - Text Field - Read Only
CAPEX: - Currency format (IDR) - Read Only
OPEX: - Currency format (IDR) - Read Only
NPV: - Currency format (IDR) - Read Only
IRR: - Percentage format - Read Only
Sasaran: - Text Area - Read Only
Teknologi Lisensor: - Text Field - Read Only
Raw Material Supplier: - Text Field - Read Only
Offtaker: - Text Field - Read Only
Dokumen Pendukung: - Text Area - Read Only
Keterangan: - Text Area - Read Only
Status: - Tag format with color - Green: Assign, Orange: Unassign
Last Sync Date: - Date format - Read Only
Business Initiative Name: - Text Field - Read Only
Role: Admin
Tambah Approver & Viewer Button: - Hidden when status is 'Assign' - Visible and clickable when status is 'Unassign' - Navigate to add-approver-viewer page
Navigation: Back to list with breadcrumb
All fields are read-only for display purposes
Status Display: Shown as tag chip with color (Green: Assign, Orange: Unassign)
Perusahaan*: - Select Dropdown - Required field - Options: MindID Group companies
Tim Project*: - Select Dropdown - Required field - Options: Tim Engineering, Tim Construction, Tim Operations, Tim Finance, Tim IT & Digital, Tim HSE, Tim Procurement, Tim Legal & Compliance

Approver PMO AH*: - Dynamic field with Add/Delete functionality - Each field is a single Select Dropdown - Required field (minimum 1 approver) - Can add multiple fields using 'Tambah Approver PMO AH' button - Can delete fields using delete button (only when more than 1 field exists) - Each field has search/filter capability

Approver PMO Mind ID*: - Dynamic field with Add/Delete functionality - Each field is a single Select Dropdown - Required field (minimum 1 approver) - Can add multiple fields using 'Tambah Approver PMO Mind ID' button - Can delete fields using delete button (only when more than 1 field exists) - Each field has search/filter capability

Viewer*: - Dynamic field with Add/Delete functionality - Each field is a single Select Dropdown - Required field (minimum 1 viewer) - Can add multiple fields using 'Tambah Viewer' button - Can delete fields using delete button (only when more than 1 field exists) - Each field has search/filter capability
Trigger: Displayed when "Add Approver & Viewer" button is clicked from detail page
detail.note: Breadcrumb: Master Data / Feasibility Studies / [Investment Name] / Tambah Approver & Viewer

detail.text: Modal Title: "Konfirmasi Tambah Approver & Viewer"
Confirmation Message: "Apakah Anda yakin ingin menambahkan Approver & Viewer untuk feasibility study ini?"
Basic Information Section: Shows Investment Name, Company, Investment Code, Project Code
Financial Information Section: Shows CAPEX, OPEX, NPV, IRR
Modal Actions: "Lanjutkan" (OK) and "Batal" (Cancel) buttons
Validation: Form validation before showing modal
detail.note: Shows modal only if all required fields are filled

detail.text: Trigger: Displayed when "Add Approver & Viewer" button is clicked from list page

detail.text: Role: Admin
Form Validation: All fields are required
Add Approver & Viewer Button: Shows confirmation modal with Basic Information & Financial Information
Cancel Button: Navigate back to detail page
Search Functionality: All dropdowns have search/filter capability
Success: Show success message and navigate back to detail page
